predict_diagnosis:
1. Smith-Lemli-Opitz Syndrome (SLOS)
2. Chediak-Higashi Syndrome (CHS)
3. Griscelli Syndrome
4. Inflammatory Bowel Disease (IBD) with associated immune dysregulation
5. Mitochondrial Disease, particularly those affecting the central nervous system
6. Storage Disease, such as Gaucher's Disease or other lysosomal storage disorders
7. Ataxia-Telangiectasia (AT)
8. Primary Immunodeficiency Disease, such as Severe Combined Immunodeficiency (SCID)
9. Neurofibromatosis Type 1 (NF1) with associated hematological abnormalities
10. Tuberous Sclerosis Complex (TSC) with hematological and gastrointestinal manifestations

Please note that these are differential diagnoses based on the symptoms provided and each would require further clinical evaluation and diagnostic testing to confirm.
